form.description: Display customizable metadata about Splunk indexes and sourcetypes.

search.query: | tstats min(_time) as first_event max(_time) as last_event count where index=* by index sourcetype | search NOT index IN(assetsummary, cim_modactions, csvsummary, endpoint_summary, firedalerts, notable, risk, summary, threat_activity) | lookup amelia_data_dictionary_lookup index sourcetype | addinfo | eval events_per_day=round(86400*(count/(info_max_time-info_min_time))) | fields - info_max_time info_min_time info_search_time info_sid | $filter$

form.label: Data Dictionary Explorer

panel.html: Additional information is provided by the Amelia Data Dictionary Lookup

search.query:
| search index=$index$ | where if("$search$"!="",like(lower(description),lower("%$search$%")),true()) | where if("$owner$"!="",owner=="$owner$",true()) | convert ctime(*_event) | foreach * [ eval "<<FIELD>>"=mvdedup('<<FIELD>>') ]
| join index [ | rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/distributed-indexes | fields title frozenTimePeriodInSecs | rename title as index | eval frozen_time_period_date=now()+frozenTimePeriodInSecs | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d" ctime(frozen_time_period_date) ]
| fields index sourcetype first_event last_event count events_per_day owner security_related "business purpose" description cim_status frozenTimePeriodInSecs frozen_time_period_date *
